content: knitted lights pattern knit a simple swatch of light in stockinette stitch for use as home decor starting at the end closest to the usb power source cast on 23 sts using backward loop cast-on tip keep stitches somewhat loose throughout so needle tips fit easily through the wire loops next row ws purl next row rs knit repeat last 2 row in stockinette stitch until you near the end of your lights - approx 18 row worked total final row knit 12 sts and stop leaving remaining tail end at middle of work finishing tighten stitches on the needles so they don t slip out block stitches by opening the wire fabric up by hand until stitches are relatively even hang on wall using enclosed picture hook placed through a center stitch below the needles ©2020 leila raven all rights reserved for personal use only
